pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Media has NEVER been more Dishonest or Corrupt than it is right now. There has never been a time like this in American History. Very exciting but also, very sad! Fake News is the absolute Enemy of the People and our Country itself!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump frequently labels as "fake news" legitimate news organizations that run critical or skeptical articles about him or his administration. Such organizations try hard to get the facts right and quickly correct mistakes when they occur. "Enemy of the people" is an especially harsh term.
